title: Indian State Refiners Back Off Russian Oil Buying as U.S. Escalates Tariffs
summary: The biggest Indian state-owned refiners are pulling out of spot purchases of Russian crude for cargoes loading in October, sources familiar with the procurement plans told Bloomberg on Thursday, a day after the U.S.
fullContent: The biggest Indian state-owned refiners are pulling out of spot purchases of Russian crude for cargoes loading in October, sources familiar with the procurement plans told Bloomberg on Thursday, a day after the U.S. announced an additional 25% tariff on India over its imports of crude from Russia. U.S. President Donald Trump signed on Wednesday an executive order enacting an additional 25% tariff on Indian goods, explicitly targeting India’s ongoing imports of Russian crude oil. This order increases the total tariff rate on Indian…

summary: A court has cleared a 42-year-old coach of molesting a former player on the Hong Kong women’s football team on two occasions in 2021 after highlighting inconsistencies in the complainant’s evidence.
fullContent: A court has cleared a 42-year-old coach of molesting a former player on the Hong Kong women’s football team on two occasions in 2021 after highlighting inconsistencies in the complainant’s evidence. West Kowloon Court on Thursday found Wong Chi-wai not guilty of two counts of indecent assault and pointed to “crucial” discrepancies between the written and oral testimonies of the woman, who had also worked at the defendant’s sportswear firm. title: Sebi introduces joint inspection framework for brokers, DPs
summary: Markets regulator Sebi on Thursday mandated a unified annual inspection for stock brokers and depository participants to be conducted jointly by all relevant market infrastructure institutions, replacing the existing practice of separate assessments by each entity.
fullContent: Markets regulator Sebi on Thursday mandated a unified annual inspection for stock brokers and depository participants to be conducted jointly by all relevant market infrastructure institutions, replacing the existing practice of separate assessments by each entity.

title: Airbnb Growth Accelerates As Q2 Earnings Beat. Why The Stock Is Falling Anyway.
These 9 smallcap stocks hit 52-week highs; rally up to 65% in a month
summary: Despite the Sensex closing 79 points higher on Thursday, nine BSE Smallcap stocks hit 52-week highs before slipping into negative territory. Traders view such highs as bullish indicators, though profit booking often follows steep short-term gains.
fullContent: Despite the Sensex closing 79 points higher on Thursday, nine BSE Smallcap stocks hit 52-week highs before slipping into negative territory. Traders view such highs as bullish indicators, though profit booking often follows steep short-term gains.

title: IVRCL Limited
summary: IVRCL LIMITED has informed the Exchange about Board Meeting to be held on 13-Aug-2025 to inter-alia consider and approve the Unaudited Financial results of the Company for the Quarterly ended June 2025 . |SUBJECT: Board Meeting Intimation.
